QuestData.Title: WANTED: Bonelashers Dead!
QuestData.Description: The bonelashers of the Bone Wastes bit Mawg and made him sick. Now he wants all of them destroyed!$B$BWhile they can be found throughout the wastes, they are known to congregate at Carrion Hill in the north.$B$BReturn to Mawg Grimshot after you've done the deed and he'll give you a good reward.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 20 Bonelashers and then report to Mawg Grimshot at Stonebreaker Hold in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is that bonelasher blood on your hands that I smell?
QuestData.RewardText: You must have killed a lot of those bonelashers! Good, I hate them! Ever since I was bit by one of them, I keep having fainting spells.$B$BDo you realize how embarrassing that is? Here, take this as thanks for exacting some revenge for me.
